tool_description: Access detailed car data and captivating visuals effortlessly.
title: InfoCarsAPI

api_list.name: Get Car Data
api_list.description: You can get specifications, pictures and the average pricing of a car
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://infocarsapi.p.rapidapi.com/cars/{maker}/{model}/{year}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infocarsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Car Models
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the models of a respective car maker
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://infocarsapi.p.rapidapi.com/cars/{maker}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infocarsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Car Makers
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all car makers supported.
api_list.code:

url = "https://infocarsapi.p.rapidapi.com/cars"

headers = {

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infocarsapi.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
